# Visualizing the 2020 Ivy League Men's Basketball Regular Season

\url{"https://sbilliau.shinyapps.io/ivy_mbb2020/"}

This RShiny application is a one-stop-shop for Ivy League Men's Basketball statistics complete with visualizations to allow for easy comparison. 

## Data Source: 

Sport-Reference, \url{"https://www.sports-reference.com/cbb/conferences/ivy/2020.html"}
